system.description: The character knows the dark rituals to sacrifice living victims to the warp, channeling their life force to empower psychic manifestations and deflect backlash.
system.benefit: Any reasonable time before Manifesting a Psychic Power, character can spend 2d5 minutes preparing a sacrifice, requiring a Forbidden Lore (Warp) Skill Test, where a living victim is bounded and anointed. Once prepared, they may spend a Full Action to sacrifice the target, in the subsequent turn they gain +5 to their Focus Power Test per Degree of Success on the Forbidden Lore(Warp) Test. Any occuring Psychic Phenomena or Perils of the Warp will target the sacrifice, if this would cause an effect that would affect the character, the body burns in warpfire, dealing 1d10 Energy Damage to anyone within 3m, or 1d10 Energy Damage with Warp Weapon Trait to anyone within 5m if Perils of the Warp.

rollConfig.description: Forbidden Lore (Warp) Test to prepare sacrifice

specialAbilities.name: Ritual Sacrifice
specialAbilities.description: Spend 2d5 minutes preparing a living sacrifice with a Forbidden Lore (Warp) Test. Then spend a Full Action to sacrifice them. On your next turn, gain +5 to Focus Power Test per DoS on the Forbidden Lore test. Psychic Phenomena and Perils target the sacrifice instead of you.
